"I am sure there must be here ... advice." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.ref: you will push the Arameans until they are consumed
tn.text: AT: "You will defeat them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

tn.text: AT: "I told you to only speak the truth in the name of Yahweh" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.text: AT: "without good leadership" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])

tn.text: AT: "a spirit who makes the prophets lie"

tn.text: Jehoshaphat was wrongly identified as the king of Israel because Ahab had insisted that he wear kingly robes.

tn.text: AT: "God caused them to stop pursuing him."
